index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
DEPARTMENT OF DESIGN CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Construction and Land Use; changing the name of the Department of Construction and Land Use to the Department of Design, Construction and Land Use; amending Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 3.06 to reflect this change and changing a fund name to reflect this change; updating other obsolete references in Chapter 3.06; and authorizing the Code Reviser to make changes over time to all references elsewhere in the Seattle Municipal Code necessary to carry out the name change.
